text: [Music]
the data ecosystem is an AWS data
platform that was created to manage the
data flows end to end for our
biodiversity monitoring surveys it
allows us to bring data from third party
apis from acoustic sensors or from
visual observations and combine that
with a core common data model and good
metadata standards built in uh to inform
research so that we can understand what
nature positive actions we can take in
conservation it's built on serus
architecture fargate that gives us the
scalability we're using Cognito API
gateways um to protect that through a um
a virtual private Cloud we've got
document DB and S3 for the storage and
ultimately um glue is providing the ETL
so we can manage all those different
data p lines from different data sources
with a common data model uh and
ultimately our researchers are then able
to analyze that with sage maker
